LocationName.description: The name of the delivery location.

City.description: The city of the delivery address.

State.description: The state of the delivery address.

Country.description: The country of the delivery address.

Zip.description: The postal code or zip code of the delivery address.

LocationDesc.description: The description of the delivery location.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the delivery address.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the delivery address.

LocationAdditionalDetails.description: Additional information about the delivery location.
